definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
lit. like the sun at noon (idiom)/fig. to be at the peak of one's power, career etc

sentences.english: The theater always shows a new movie on Boxing Day.
sentences.chinese: 這個劇院總會在節禮日中播放一部新的影片。

sentences.english: What significance does the dialogue have in China's opinion?
sentences.chinese: 中方認爲日中安全對話有何意義？

sentences.english: In a three-month retreat, monks and nun used to have a formal meal every day.
sentences.chinese: 在三個月的安居期間，比丘和比丘尼習慣於日中一餐。

sentences.english: Castaways event was an important channel for exchanges between Japan and china during the Edo period.
sentences.chinese: 漂流事件是江戶時代日中兩國交往的重要渠道。

sentences.english: The current bilateral relations are facing some worrying situation.
sentences.chinese: 當前日中關係面臨着令人憂慮的局面。

sentences.english: Third, define the time and duration of periods when they fall on certain days of week.
sentences.chinese: 第三，定義落在一週內特定日中的時段的時間區間。

sentences.english: A correct understanding of history 'should help improve relations between Japan and China, ' he added.
sentences.chinese: 他補充說，正確理解歷史應當有助於改善日中關係。

sentences.english: Japan and China have enjoyed relatively stable ties in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 日中兩國近年來享有相對穩定的關係。

sentences.english: He hoped that the Diet's Japan-China Friendship League could carry forward the friendly tradition and continue to play active role in this field.
sentences.chinese: 希望日中議聯秉承友好傳統，繼續發揮積極作用。

sentences.english: In this thesis, he author admitted that the Japanese-Chinese cultural untranslatability always exists.
sentences.chinese: 本文承認日中文化不可譯是一直存在的。

definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
future days/(literary) the next day/(old) past days
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
Dashu or Great Heat, 12th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd July-6th August
forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle
Chunfen or Spring Equinox, 4th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st March-4th April
Qiufen or Autumn Equinox, 16th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd September-7th October
solstice/the winter solstice 冬至 and summer solstice 夏至
Chushu or End of Heat, 14th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd August-7th September
